disabledCurrentUserMessage: The current user cannot be disabled
downgradeCurrentUserLongMessage: Cannot downgrade current user's role. Hence, current user will not be shown.

database.title: Database Import/Export
database.info_1: When importing data, it is crucial to ensure the correct structure. If you are unsure of what you are doing, seek advice and support from a professional. An error in the structure can cause application malfunctions, up to and including the complete inability to run the application.
database.info_2: The file name does not matter when uploading. It will be renamed afterward to follow the format backup_user_yyyyMMddHHmm.sql, ensuring a consistent naming convention.

watermark.title: Add Watermark
watermark.desc: Add text or image watermarks to PDF files

error.failed: An error occurred while adding watermark to the PDF.

language.title: Language Support
language.text: Choose the appropriate language setting to ensure proper font rendering for your text.

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.text: Control how your watermark looks and blends with the document.

spacing.title: Spacing Control
spacing.text: Adjust the spacing between repeated watermarks across the page.
spacing.bullet1: Width spacing: Horizontal distance between watermarks
spacing.bullet2: Height spacing: Vertical distance between watermarks
spacing.bullet3: Higher values create more spread out patterns

description.title: Choose Your Watermark
description.text: Select between text or image watermarks based on your needs.

text.title: Text Watermarks
text.text: Perfect for adding copyright notices, company names, or confidentiality labels. Supports multiple languages and custom colours.
text.bullet3: Ideal for legal or branding text

image.title: Image Watermarks
image.text: Use logos, stamps, or any image as a watermark. Great for branding and visual identification.

text.title: Watermark Text
text.text: Enter the text that will appear as your watermark across the document.
text.bullet1: Keep it concise for better readability
text.bullet3: Emoji characters are not supported and will be filtered out

color.title: Colour Selection
color.text: Choose a colour that provides good contrast with your document content.
color.bullet2: Black or dark colours for high contrast

language.title: Language Support
language.text: Choose the appropriate language setting to ensure proper font rendering.

upload.title: Image Selection
upload.text: Upload an image file to use as your watermark.
upload.bullet1: Supports common formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP
upload.bullet3: Higher resolution images maintain quality better

recommendations.title: Best Practices
recommendations.text: Tips for optimal image watermark results.
recommendations.bullet1: Use logos or stamps with transparent backgrounds
recommendations.bullet2: Simple designs work better than complex images
recommendations.bullet3: Consider the final document size when choosing resolution

size.title: Size Control
size.text: Adjust the size of your watermark (text or image).
size.bullet1: Larger sizes create more prominent watermarks

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.text: Control how your watermark looks and blends with the document.

spacing.title: Spacing Control
spacing.text: Adjust the spacing between repeated watermarks across the page.
spacing.bullet1: Horizontal spacing: Distance between watermarks left to right
spacing.bullet2: Vertical spacing: Distance between watermarks top to bottom
spacing.bullet3: Higher values create more spread out patterns

security.title: Security Option
security.text: Convert the final PDF to an image-based format for enhanced security.
security.bullet4: Best for sensitive or copyrighted content

permissions.title: Change Permissions
permissions.warning: Warning to have these permissions be unchangeable it is recommended to set them with a password via the add-password page

removePages.pageNumbersHelp: Enter page numbers separated by commas, or ranges like 1-5. Example: 1,3,5-7

error.failed: An error occurred whilst removing pages.

basic.title: Basic Usage
basic.text: Select specific pages from your PDF document using simple syntax.

syntax.title: Syntax Basics
syntax.text: Use numbers, ranges, keywords, and progressions (n starts at 0). Parentheses are supported.

operators.title: Operators
operators.text: AND has higher precedence than comma. NOT applies within the document range.
operators.and: AND: & or "and" — require both conditions (e.g., 1-50 & even)

syntax.title: Syntax Basics
syntax.text: Use numbers, ranges, keywords, and progressions (n starts at 0). Parentheses are supported.

operators.title: Operators
operators.text: AND has higher precedence than comma. NOT applies within the document range.
operators.and: AND: & or "and" — require both conditions (e.g., 1-50 & even)

unlockPDFForms.description: This tool will remove read-only restrictions from PDF form fields, making them editable and fillable.

error.failed: An error occurred whilst unlocking PDF forms.

selectText.1: Please edit the variables you wish to change

fileToPDF.title: File to PDF
fileToPDF.credit: This service uses LibreOffice and Unoconv for file conversion.
fileToPDF.supportedFileTypes: Supported file types should include the below however for a full updated list of supported formats, please refer to the LibreOffice documentation

ocr.title: OCR / Scan Cleanup
ocr.desc: Cleanup scans and detects text from images within a PDF and re-adds it as text.

selectText.1: Select languages that are to be detected within the PDF (Ones listed are the ones currently detected):
selectText.2: Produce text file containing OCR text alongside the OCR'ed PDF
selectText.3: Correct pages were scanned at a skewed angle by rotating them back into place
selectText.4: Clean page so its less likely that OCR will find text in background noise. (No output change)
selectText.5: Clean page so its less likely that OCR will find text in background noise, maintains cleanup in output.
selectText.6: Ignores pages that have interactive text on them, only OCRs pages that are images
selectText.7: Force OCR, will OCR Every page removing all original text elements
selectText.8: Normal (Will error if PDF contains text)
selectText.11: Remove images after OCR (Removes ALL images, only useful if part of conversion step)

ocr.help: Please read this documentation on how to use this for other languages and/or use not in docker
ocr.credit: This service uses qpdf and Tesseract for OCR.

mode.title: OCR Mode
mode.text: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) helps you turn scanned or screenshotted pages into text you can search, copy, or highlight.
mode.bullet1: Auto skips pages that already contain text layers.
mode.bullet2: Force re-OCRs every page and replaces all the text.
mode.bullet3: Strict halts if any selectable text is found.

languages.title: Languages
languages.text: Improve OCR accuracy by specifying the expected languages. Choose one or more languages to guide detection.

output.title: Output
output.text: Decide how you want the text output formatted:
output.bullet1: Searchable PDF embeds text behind the original image.
output.bullet2: HOCR XML returns a structured machine-readable file.
output.bullet3: Plain-text sidecar creates a separate .txt file with raw content.

compatibility.title: Compatibility Mode
compatibility.text: Uses OCR 'sandwich PDF' mode: results in larger files, but more reliable with certain languages and older PDF software. By default we use hOCR for smaller, modern PDFs.

sidecar.title: Create Text File
sidecar.text: Generates a separate .txt file alongside the PDF containing all extracted text content for easy access and processing.

deskew.title: Deskew Pages
deskew.text: Automatically corrects skewed or tilted pages to improve OCR accuracy. Useful for scanned documents that weren't perfectly aligned.

clean.title: Clean Input File
clean.text: Preprocesses the input by removing noise, enhancing contrast, and optimising the image for better OCR recognition before processing.

cleanFinal.title: Clean Final Output
cleanFinal.text: Post-processes the final PDF by removing OCR artefacts and optimising the text layer for better readability and smaller file size.

extractImages.title: Extract Images
extractImages.selectText: Select image format to convert extracted images to

pdfToPDFA.title: PDF To PDF/A
pdfToPDFA.credit: This service uses libreoffice for PDF/A conversion
pdfToPDFA.tip: Currently does not work for multiple inputs at once
pdfToPDFA.pdfWithDigitalSignature: The PDF contains a digital signature. This will be removed in the next step.

PDFToHTML.credit: This service uses pdftohtml for file conversion.

selectText.2: Sets the minimum absolute angle required for the image to be rotated (default: 10).
selectText.4: Determines the range of colour variation around the estimated background colour (default: 30).
selectText.6: Sets the minimum area threshold for a photo (default: 10000).
selectText.8: Sets the minimum contour area threshold for a photo
selectText.10: Sets the size of the border added and removed to prevent white borders in the output (default: 1).

ScannerImageSplit.info: Python is not installed. It is required to run.

files.placeholder: Select a PDF file in the main view to get started

options.title: Flatten Options
options.flattenOnlyForms.desc: Only flatten form fields, leaving other interactive elements intact
options.note: Flattening removes interactive elements from the PDF, making them non-editable.

error.failed: An error occurred while flattening the PDF.

description.title: What does flattening do?
description.text: Flattening makes your PDF non-editable by turning fillable forms and buttons into regular text and images. The PDF will look exactly the same, but no one can change or fill in the forms anymore. Perfect for sharing completed forms, creating final documents for records, or ensuring the PDF looks the same everywhere.
description.bullet1: Text boxes become regular text (can't be edited)
description.bullet3: Great for final versions you don't want changed
description.bullet4: Ensures consistent appearance across all devices

formsOnly.title: What does 'Flatten only forms' mean?
formsOnly.text: This option only removes the ability to fill in forms, but keeps other features working like clicking links, viewing bookmarks, and reading comments.

repair.title: Repair
repair.description: This tool will attempt to repair corrupted or damaged PDF files. No additional settings are required.

files.placeholder: Select a PDF file in the main view to get started

error.failed: An error occurred whilst repairing the PDF.

removeBlanks.title: Remove Blanks
removeBlanks.thresholdDesc: Threshold for determining how white a white pixel must be to be classed as 'White'. 0 = Black, 255 pure white.
removeBlanks.whitePercentDesc: Percent of page that must be 'white' pixels to be removed

complex.message: One or both of the provided documents are large files, accuracy of comparison may be reduced

file.message: One or Both of the provided documents are too large to process

text.message: One or both of the selected PDFs have no text content. Please choose PDFs with text for comparison.

certSign.title: Certificate Signing
certSign.header: Sign a PDF with your certificate (Work in progress)
certSign.selectPDF: Select a PDF File for Signing:
certSign.jksNote: Note: If your certificate type is not listed below, please convert it to a Java Keystore (.jks) file using the keytool command line tool. Then, choose the .jks file option below.
certSign.selectKey: Select Your Private Key File (PKCS#8 format, could be .pem or .der):
certSign.selectCert: Select Your Certificate File (X.509 format, could be .pem or .der):
certSign.selectP12: Select Your PKCS#12 Keystore File (.p12 or .pfx) (Optional, If provided, it should contain your private key and certificate):
certSign.selectJKS: Select Your Java Keystore File (.jks or .keystore):
certSign.password: Enter Your Keystore or Private Key Password (If Any):
certSign.name: Name

removeCertSign.title: Remove Certificate Signature
removeCertSign.header: Remove the digital certificate from the PDF
removeCertSign.description: This tool will remove digital certificate signatures from your PDF document.

error.failed: An error occurred whilst removing certificate signatures.

scalePages.title: Adjust page-scale
scalePages.pageSize: Size of a page of the document.

error.failed: An error occurred while adjusting the page scale.

description.title: Description
description.text: Adjust the size of PDF content and change the page dimensions.

scaleFactor.title: Scale Factor
scaleFactor.text: Controls how large or small the content appears on the page. Content is scaled and centred - if scaled content is larger than the page size, it may be cropped.

pageSize.title: Target Page Size
pageSize.text: Sets the dimensions of the output PDF pages. 'Keep Original Size' maintains current dimensions, whilst other options resize to standard paper sizes.

auto-rename.title: Auto Rename
auto-rename.description: Automatically finds the title from your PDF content and uses it as the filename.

files.placeholder: Select a PDF file in the main view to get started

error.failed: An error occurred whilst auto-renaming the PDF.

howItWorks.title: Smart Renaming
howItWorks.text: Automatically finds the title from your PDF content and uses it as the filename.
howItWorks.bullet1: Looks for text that appears to be a title or heading
howItWorks.bullet2: Creates a clean, valid filename from the detected title
howItWorks.bullet3: Keeps the original name if no suitable title is found

autoSplitPDF.title: Auto Split PDF
autoSplitPDF.description: Print, Insert, Scan, upload, and let us auto-separate your documents. No manual work sorting needed.

selectText.1: Print out some divider sheets from below (Black and white is fine).
selectText.2: Scan all your documents at once by inserting the divider sheet between them.
selectText.3: Upload the single large scanned PDF file and let Stirling PDF handle the rest.
selectText.4: Divider pages are automatically detected and removed, guaranteeing a neat final document.

autoSplitPDF.formPrompt: Submit PDF containing Stirling-PDF Page dividers:

HTMLToPDF.title: HTML To PDF
HTMLToPDF.help: Accepts HTML files and ZIPs containing html/css/images etc required
HTMLToPDF.zoom: Zoom level for displaying the website.
HTMLToPDF.pageWidth: Width of the page in centimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.pageHeight: Height of the page in centimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.marginTop: Top margin of the page in millimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.marginBottom: Bottom margin of the page in millimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.marginLeft: Left margin of the page in millimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.marginRight: Right margin of the page in millimeters. (Blank to default)
HTMLToPDF.defaultHeader: Enable Default Header (Name and page number)
HTMLToPDF.cssMediaType: Change the CSS media type of the page.

error.failed: An error occurred while redacting the PDF.

modeSelector.title: Redaction Method
modeSelector.automaticDesc: Redact text based on search terms
modeSelector.manualDesc: Click and drag to redact specific areas

automatic.title: Automatic Redaction
automatic.text: Automatically finds and redacts specified text throughout the document. Perfect for removing consistent sensitive information like names, addresses, or confidential markers.

manual.title: Manual Redaction
manual.text: Click and drag to manually select specific areas to redact. Gives you precise control over what gets redacted. (Coming soon)

description.title: Text Matching
description.text: Enter words or phrases to find and redact in your document. Each word will be searched for separately.

words.bullet1: Add one word at a time
words.bullet2: Press Enter or click 'Add Another' to add

examples.title: Common Examples
examples.text: Typical words to redact include: bank details, email addresses, or specific names.

color.title: Box Colour & Padding
color.text: Customise the appearance of redaction boxes. Black is standard, but you can choose any colour. Padding adds extra space around the found text.

regex.title: Use Regex
regex.text: Enable regular expressions for advanced pattern matching. Useful for finding phone numbers, emails, or complex patterns.
regex.bullet1: Example: \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} to match any dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

wholeWord.title: Whole Word Search
wholeWord.text: Only match complete words, not partial matches. 'John' won't match 'Johnson' when enabled.

convert.title: Convert to PDF-Image
convert.text: Converts the PDF to an image-based PDF after redaction. This ensures text behind redaction boxes is completely removed and unrecoverable.

manual.convertPDFToImageLabel: Convert PDF to PDF-Image (Used to remove text behind the box)
manual.showDocumentOutline: Show Document Outline (double-click to expand/collapse all items)
manual.showLayers: Show Layers (double-click to reset all layers to the default state)

pdfToSinglePage.description: This tool will merge all pages of your PDF into one large single page. The width will remain the same as the original pages, but the height will be the sum of all page heights.

compress.title: Compress
compress.desc: Compress PDFs to reduce their file size.
compress.credit: This service uses qpdf for PDF Compress/Optimisation.

1.1: 1-3 PDF compression,</br> 4-6 lite image compression,</br> 7-9 intense image compression Will dramatically reduce image quality

selectText.4: Auto mode - Auto adjusts quality to get PDF to exact size

decrypt.invalidPassword: Please try again with the correct password.
decrypt.invalidPasswordHeader: Incorrect password or unsupported encryption for PDF: {0}

multiTool-advert.message: This feature is also available in our multi-tool page. Check it out for enhanced page-by-page UI and additional features!

pageRemover.title: Page Remover
pageRemover.pagesToDelete: Pages to delete (Enter a comma-separated list of page numbers) :

selectText.3: Multi file logic (Only enabled if working with multiple images)

split-by-size-or-count.title: Split PDF by Size or Count
split-by-size-or-count.header: Split PDF by Size or Count

survey.title: Stirling-PDF Survey
survey.description: Stirling-PDF has no tracking so we want to hear from our users to improve Stirling-PDF!
survey.changes: Stirling-PDF has changed since the last survey! To find out more please check our blog post here:
survey.changes2: With these changes we are getting paid business support and funding
survey.please: Please consider taking our survey to have input on the future of Stirling-PDF!
survey.disabled: (Survey popup will be disabled in following updates but available at foot of page)

meeting.1: If you're using Stirling PDF at work, we'd love to speak to you. We're offering technical support sessions in exchange for a 15 minute user discovery session.
meeting.3: Get help with deployment, integrations, or troubleshooting
meeting.4: Provide direct feedback on performance, edge cases, and feature gaps
meeting.5: Help us refine Stirling PDF for real-world enterprise use
meeting.6: If you're interested, you can book time with our team directly. (English speaking only)
meeting.7: Looking forward to digging into your use cases and making Stirling PDF even better!
meeting.notInterested: Not a business and/or interested in a meeting?

desc.1: This tool splits a PDF file into multiple PDFs based on its chapter structure.
desc.2: Bookmark Level: Choose the level of bookmarks to use for splitting (0 for top-level, 1 for second-level, etc.).
desc.3: Include Metadata: If checked, the original PDF's metadata will be included in each split PDF.
desc.4: Allow Duplicates: If checked, allows multiple bookmarks on the same page to create separate PDFs.

releases.title: Release Notes
releases.note: Release notes are only available in English

swagger.title: API Documentation
swagger.desc: View and test the Stirling PDF API endpoints

description.1: We use cookies and other technologies to make Stirling PDF work better for you—helping us improve our tools and keep building features you'll love.
description.2: If you'd rather not, clicking 'No Thanks' will only enable the essential cookies needed to keep things running smoothly.

description.1: Stirling PDF uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and understand how our tools are used. This helps us improve performance, develop the features you care about, and provide ongoing support to our users.
description.2: Stirling PDF cannot—and will never—track or access the content of the documents you use.
description.3: Your privacy and trust are at the core of what we do.

necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core features like setting your privacy preferences, logging in, and filling out forms—which is why they can't be turned off.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how our tools are being used, so we can focus on building the features our community values most. Rest assured—Stirling PDF cannot and will never track the content of the documents you work with.

pageEditor.title: Page Editor
pageEditor.noPdfLoaded: No PDF loaded. Please upload a PDF to edit.
pageEditor.addFileNotImplemented: Add file not implemented in demo

viewer.noPdfLoaded: No PDF loaded. Click to upload a PDF.

fileUpload.chooseFromStorage: Choose a file from storage or upload a new PDF
fileUpload.chooseFromStorageMultiple: Choose files from storage or upload new PDFs
fileUpload.dropFileHere: Drop file here or click to upload
fileUpload.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click the upload button
fileUpload.noFilesInStorage: No files available in storage. Upload some files first.
fileUpload.dragFilesInOrClick: Drag files in or click "Add Files" to browse

fileManager.title: Upload PDF Files
fileManager.subtitle: Add files to your storage for easy access across tools
fileManager.failedToOpen: Failed to open file. It may have been removed from storage.
fileManager.failedToLoad: Failed to load file to active set.
fileManager.storageCleared: Browser cleared storage. Files have been removed. Please re-upload.
fileManager.storageLow: Storage is running low. Consider removing old files.
fileManager.supportMessage: Powered by browser database storage for unlimited capacity

storage.temporaryNotice: Files are stored temporarily in your browser and may be cleared automatically
storage.storageFull: Storage is nearly full. Consider removing some files.
storage.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size per file is
storage.storageQuotaExceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Please remove some files before uploading more.

sanitize.title: Sanitise
sanitize.desc: Remove potentially harmful elements from PDF files.
sanitize.error.failed: An error occurred while sanitising the PDF.

files.placeholder: Select a PDF file in the main view to get started

options.title: Sanitisation Options
options.note: Select the elements you want to remove from the PDF. At least one option must be selected.
options.removeJavaScript.desc: Remove JavaScript actions and scripts from the PDF
options.removeEmbeddedFiles.desc: Remove any files embedded within the PDF
options.removeXMPMetadata.desc: Remove XMP metadata from the PDF
options.removeMetadata.desc: Remove document information metadata (title, author, etc.)
options.removeLinks.desc: Remove external links and launch actions from the PDF
options.removeFonts.desc: Remove embedded fonts from the PDF

addPassword.title: Add Password
addPassword.desc: Encrypt your PDF document with a password.

error.failed: An error occurred while encrypting the PDF.

passwords.title: Password Types
passwords.text: User passwords restrict opening the document, while owner passwords control what can be done with the document once opened. You can set both or just one.
passwords.bullet1: User Password: Required to open the PDF
passwords.bullet2: Owner Password: Controls document permissions (not supported by all PDF viewers)

encryption.title: Encryption Levels
encryption.text: Higher encryption levels provide better security but may not be supported by older PDF viewers.
encryption.bullet1: 40-bit: Basic security, compatible with older viewers

permissions.title: Change Permissions
permissions.text: These permissions control what users can do with the PDF. Most effective when combined with an owner password.

error.failed: An error occurred while changing PDF permissions.

description.text: Changes document permissions, allowing/disallowing access to different features in PDF readers.

warning.text: To make these permissions unchangeable, use the Add Password tool to set an owner password.

removePassword.title: Remove Password
removePassword.desc: Remove password protection from your PDF document.

error.failed: An error occurred while removing the password from the PDF.

tooltip.description: Removing password protection requires the password that was used to encrypt the PDF. This will decrypt the document, making it accessible without a password.

automate.title: Automate
automate.desc: Build multi-step workflows by chaining together PDF actions. Ideal for recurring tasks.

files.placeholder: Select files to process with this automation

creation.intro: Automations run tools sequentially. To get started, add tools in the order you want them to run.

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to go back? All changes will be lost.

config.noSettings: This tool does not have configurable settings.
config.title: Configure {{toolName}}
config.description: Configure the settings for this tool. These settings will be applied when the automation runs.

suggested.securePdfIngestionDesc: Comprehensive PDF processing workflow that sanitises documents, applies OCR with cleanup, converts to PDF/A format for long-term archival, and optimises file size.
suggested.emailPreparationDesc: Optimises PDFs for email distribution by compressing files, splitting large documents into 20MB chunks for email compatibility, and removing metadata for privacy.
suggested.secureWorkflowDesc: Secures PDF documents by removing potentially malicious content like JavaScript and embedded files, then adds password protection to prevent unauthorised access. Password is set to 'password' by default.
suggested.processImagesDesc: Converts multiple image files into a single PDF document, then applies OCR technology to extract searchable text from the images.
